itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Iron Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Metal Solvent
item.desc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Fishing Boat Decoration
item.desc:
A decoration that can be attached to a fishing boat. It lowers the chance of breaking trade items.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Fishing Boat
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Epheria Fishing Rod
item.desc: Epheria fishing rod. It is sturdier than other rods.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Trina Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble Trina cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
This model has average durability and faster loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 5 different states.
Base Damage: 750
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Lynch Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble Lynch cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
This model has more durability and average loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 4 different states.
Base Damage: 1000
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Old Serendia Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble old Serendian cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
Old model has less durability and slower loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 3 different states.
Base Damage: 500
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Farm Wagon Badge
item.desc:
A banner for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Strong Wagon Badge
item.desc:
A banner for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Shining Steel Pickaxe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Kalis Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Ultimate Kalis Shortsword
item.desc:
A Kalis Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Kalis Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Kalis Shortsword of Destruction, Kalis Shortsword of Temptation, Kalis Shortsword

item.name: Kalis Shortsword of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Kalis Shortsword.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Shortsword of Temptation, Kalis Shortsword

item.name: Kalis Shortsword of Destruction

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Kalis Shortsword
